Art Direction Team Join In 美術團隊加入
user avatar
Cori ChanCreator
January 8, 2020
（中文在下方）

The City of Tears has successfully invited a professional Art Direction Team to join us. They will help shape the experience of Hong Kongers through complex layers of texts, images and styles.

Motion Graphic will be used to illustrate a brief history of Hong Kong in the first episode. The Art Direction Team are working on a style suitable for this part and the rest of the episodes, and the confirmed style will be used throughout the episodes in the first season.

It has come to our attention that certain individuals/ organisations have used parts of our teaser in the promotion of their projects. Some of them are commercial and that footage was used without our knowledge. We reiterate that, as of this moment, we do not have plans to use the footage shot on projects other than the documentary series and its promotion. Also, due to the agreement we have with the contributors of the footage, we are not at liberty to authorise individuals/ organisations to use the footage on other projects, paid or unpaid. However, we welcome screening of our teaser unaltered in any venue.

Thank you very much and we will keep share projects updates on our social media pages. Please continue to follow us and share this Project with your friends and family.

The City of Tears Team

《催淚之城》正式找來專業的美術指導團隊，從文字、影像及風格不同層面帶出香港人的經歷。

首集香港簡史的部分牽涉動畫製作，而美術團隊正在為此及其他部份擬定合適的風格，並沿用統一的風格至第一季所有集數。

我們留意到坊間有些個人或團體，在未有通知《催淚之城》團隊下，剪輯了本計劃預告的某些片段用作其他計劃宣傳，當中有些更涉及商業性質。我們重申本計劃暫時並沒有把拍攝片段用於本紀錄特輯及及其宣傳外，亦因與拍攝者合作的形式所限，不能授權其他個人或團體以有償/無償方式在其他計劃使用這些片段；但我們歡迎第三方在不刪減及更改內容的情況下，在任何場所播放本計劃的宣傳片。

最後，感謝大家的支持，我們會定期在社交媒體上發布最新進度，請繼續關注及分享本計劃給你的親友！
